DOC.brief_summary: To estimate the percentage of children with serum IGF-1 > 2 standard deviation (compared to a child of the same gender and age and without growth hormone (GH) deficiency) 9 months and 12 months after initiation of GH treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Study Aimed At Improving Height With Genotonorm In Children Born Little And/Or Light With Growth Retardation At The Age
DOC.criteria: Chronological age between 4 and 9 years for a boy and 4 and 7 years for a girl. Measured Height < 2.5 Standard Deviation Pubertal signs ie: testis volume > or = 4 ml in boys and breast stage > or = B2 (Tanner) Serious chronic disease (diabetes, renal insufficiency, heart failure, hepatic insufficiency, neoplasia)
